msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; some writing on the Verso
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at the right and the left. Kollesis at left and right sides. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Hatres, son of Apollonios, grandson of Heraklas, mother Taorsenouphis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 156)
Anchorimphis, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Anchorimphis, mother Apollonous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 149)
Onnophris, son of Sisois, grandson of Petsiris, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Horion, son of Onnophris, grandson of Horos, mother Herais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 249)
Heron, son of Petheus, grandson of Kollouthos, mother of Taorsenouphis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 171)
Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)
Sarapion, son of Perigenes, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tanais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Perigenes, son of Zoilos, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Sambathion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 208)
Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Taptosiris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 245)
Chairemon, his son, mother Tbelles (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 239)
Besis, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 159)
Sambas, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 223)
Onnophris, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191)
Valeria, daughter of Isia (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 194)
Valeria, duaghter of Herais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 194)
Syros, son of Mikalos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 231)
Kastor, son of Apion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 227)
Apitas, son of Kothon (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 152)
Herieus, son of Sambas, grandson of Peteesis, mother Tapapeis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 163)
Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Herieus, mother Anthia (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 218)
Ptolemaios, son of Heron, grandson of Horos, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 217)
Ptolemaios, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 218)
Pakysis, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 196)
Satabous, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 226)
Heron, son of Pekmeis alias Heuremon, mother Sambathion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 171)
Petheus, son of Sarapion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 204)
Celer (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 182)
Thaisas, daughter of Petheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 174)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224;

div.ab: "(Column) 77:;(Pauni) 17 likewise:;Horos the younger, son of Hatres, grandson of Horos, mother Teraus, copper drachmas 4;;Hatres, son of Apollonios, grandson of Heraklas, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 8;;Anchorimphis, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Anchorimphis, mother Apollonous, copper drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Sisois, grandson of Petsiris, mother Thaesis, copper drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Onnophris, grandson of Horos, mother Herais, drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Petheus, grandson of Kollouthos, mother of Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 32.;(Pauni) 18 likewise:;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Perigenes, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tanais, drachmas 8;;Perigenes, son of Zoilos, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Sambathion, drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Taptosiris, drachmas 4;;Chairemon, his son, mother Tbelles, drachmas 4;;Besis, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Sambas, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Onnophris, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis, obols 28; ;Valeria, daughter of Isia through the agency of Valeria, daughter of Herais (Syros, son of Mikalos, brother);;geometria year 12 drachmas 37 obols 3, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 2 chalki 2, in total drachmas 37 obols 5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 56 obols 26) the same woman orchard taxes drachmas apomoira drachmas 3 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 3 chalki 2, naubion obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 5.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 8 obols 3;;geometria year 12 drachmas 9 obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 10;;in total for the day drachmas 100 obols 25.;(Pauni) 19 likewise:;Kastor, son of Apion (Apitas, son of Kothon);;(in left margin:obols 27) geometria year 12 drachmas 3 obol 1, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 3 obols 2 chalki 2;;Herieus, son of Sambas, grandson of Peteesis, mother Tapapeis, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Herieus, mother Anthia, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Heron, grandson of Horos, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Pakysis, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;in total drachmas 32 obols 27;;(Pauni) 20 likewise:;Satabous, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus, copper drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Pekmeis alias Heuremon, mother Sambathion, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Sarapion (of the wife of Celer);;orchard taxes year 12 apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2;;drachmas 20 obols 13 eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 4 chalki 2;;Thaisas, daughter of Petheus;;orchard taxes year 12 drachma 1 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives obol 1 chalki 2, naubion obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obols 5;;geometria year 12 drachmas 9 obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 10."
